title: Sun Disk (Azir Passive) Penetrating bullets not working
body: Azirs turret has the Penetrating bullets item which means it should be doing increased damage per shot but the tower does a constant damage every shot. If this is intentional, please make a unique item for the sun disk so it doesn't have the same passive as the Penetrating bullets, but if it is a bug, it could make the sun disk much more useful.

replies.body: Put a [GAMEPLAY] tag on it. They tend to ignore posts that are not neat and categorized.
I'm note quite sure about this one, but if it's how you say it is, then Riot needs to deal with it.
